title: Christmas Castle
description: This is the first extra-specially long Secret Kingdom adventure!It's Christmas in the Secret Kingdom, and all of the friendly creatures in the realm are on their way to Christmas Castle for their special annual Christmas Eve sleepover.Summer, Ellie and Jasmine have been invited to join in the celebrations with all their new friends and are super excited about a visit from Santa Claus on Christmas Day!But the terrible Queen Malice and her Storm Sprites are determined to spoil everyoneâ€™s fun. Will the girls be able to break the queen's horrible spells and save Christmas?
author: Rosie Banks
